markdown:
<title level="1" right="Spell 7" pfs="Standard">
[Energy Aegis](/Spells.aspx?ID=1512)
<actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Concentrate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=32" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=216) pg. 328 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Traditions**
[Arcane](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=1), [Divine](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=2), [Occult](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=3), [Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

**Spell Lists**
[Elemental](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=5)

**Bloodline**
[Elemental](/Bloodlines.aspx?ID=24)

<row gap="medium">

**Cast** 1 minute

 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** touch

**Target** 1 creature
</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until your next daily preparations
</row>

</column>

---

You protect the target with a powerful, long-lasting energy barrier. The target gains resistance 5 to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality, and void damage.

---
**Heightened (9th)** The resistances increase to 10.
name: Energy Aegis

summary_markdown: A creature gains resistance to acid, cold, electricity, fire, force, sonic, vitality and void damage.
